ProductInfo.Features:
This Unlocked Dual SIM Cell Phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Dual SIM Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 mHz frequencies for both SIM Slots plus GPRS/WAP data capabilities.
1.3MP Camera; QWERTY Keyboard; Stereo FM radio; MP3 player; MP3 ringtones; 3.5mm Audio Jack and MicroSD slot upgradeable up to 4GB.
Games; Browser WAP 2.0/xHTML (Opera Mini); SMS; MMS; Organizer; GPRS Class 10 (4+1/3+2 slots), 32 - 48 kbps; Internal Memory 64 MB + 32 MB and MicroUSB v2.0.
Talk time up to 10hrs - Stand-by up to 600hrs.
ProductInfo.Name: BLU Q160P Deejay II - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - White/Pink
